name: Dungeon of Death
overview: Search for the holy grail guarded by the great dragon Smaug (where have I heard that name before...) This particular game is one of the earliest implementations on a home computer of the mainframe game DND, developed for PLATO in the early 70s. This is one of the earliest Dungeons & Dragons type games available for home computers, and may even predate Temple of Apshai.
